thread.title: ESPN President John Skipper Confirms Layoffs
thread.title_full: ESPN President John Skipper Confirms Layoffs

title: ESPN President John Skipper Confirms Layoffs
text:
ESPN President John Skipper Confirms ... ESPN President John Skipper Confirms Layoffs Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The top-rated sports net will pink slip about 300 employees in a reorganizational effort amid slowed growth and a contraction in lucrative subscriber fees. After weeks of speculation about a round of layoffs at ESPN, network chief John Skipper confirmed Oct. 21 in a company-wide email that the sports leader would begin eliminating positions.   Hollywood Reporter.
